document_data.caption: A map showing Starwater Road in the King's Forest of Cormyr.
document_data.name: Starwater Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Starwater Road''' was central road in [[Cormyr]] that bisected the [[King's Forest]].
document_data.Description: The road began in [[Immersea]] along the [[Wyvernwater]], passing west through the King's Forest and crossing [[Starwater River]] before turning north to pass through [[Dhedluk (town)|Dhedluk]] and then terminating at [[Eveningstar]] where it touched the [[East Way]].
